channel.title: Stormbreaker
channel.description: there's a new movie out called stormbreaker. on morpheus i searched to download it. it came up with a file about 900mb big but it said the length was 1h 26m with is exactly what it's supposed to be. after about 5 hours of downloading it finnally finished. it was an .avi file so i had to run it with something different that windows media player. i used --divX-- but i soon realised it had to sound. i was so pissed. i searched with limewire but i didnt get much. is there another good program to download movies or maybe someone could post the links to downloading stormbreaker. i read the book a long time ago and all i remember it that it was great so thats why i really want to see it.

your point being…(yeah it got turned into a movie)

item.title: Stormbreaker
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“arraness14, post:19, topic:14012”][quote author=sidishere link=topic=20957.msg246682#msg246682 date=1158426545]

Dont use anything the above people said especially that FFDShow… I tried it…its crapp…What you need is

http://www.softpedia.com/progDownload/ACE-Mega-CoDecS-Pack-Download-6778.html

Ace mega codecs pack…after geting that you wont have any problem with sound or video…just play everything in DivX or Winamp.

Belive me I had the same problem 4 days ago. What you probably have is an Ac3 Audio thingi in that video. after getting that you will hear it.

Its not the probelm with morpheus, but I think torrents are better for movie’s and stuff.

thanks soooooo much arraness14 i downloaded internet download manager then downloaded ACE-Mega-CoDecS it works!! thanks again…but im just not happy with the picture quality oh well thanks anyway, at least it works!!!
[/quote]

Np man just trying to help. picture quality depends on the video not the codecs.[/quote]

In some cases graphics card.

Read full topic

item.title: Stormbreaker
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:18, topic:14012”][quote author=arraness14 link=topic=20957.msg241907#msg241907 date=1158280166]
Dont use anything the above people said especially that FFDShow… I tried it…its crapp…What you need is

softpedia – 8 Jul 14

Download ACE Mega CoDecS Pack 6.03

Download ACE Mega CoDecS Pack. A useful collection of codecs, filters and tools that you can install on your computer for playing multimedia files, with support for different installation modes

Ace mega codecs pack…after geting that you wont have any problem with sound or video…just play everything in DivX or Winamp.

Belive me I had the same problem 4 days ago. What you probably have is an Ac3 Audio thingi in that video. after getting that you will hear it.

Its not the probelm with morpheus, but I think torrents are better for movie’s and stuff.
[/quote]
thanks soooooo much arraness14 i downloaded internet download manager then downloaded ACE-Mega-CoDecS it works!! thanks again…but im just not happy with the picture quality oh well thanks anyway, at least it works!!![/quote]

Np man just trying to help. picture quality depends on the video not the codecs.

Read full topic

item.title: Stormbreaker
item.dc:creator: @crashe crashe
item.description:
@crashe wrote:

Did you have to download DivX before you played it? If so, then just go back and play it in Media Player.
That’s what happened to me with FF7: Advent Children. It told me I needed to download a plug-in, which installed DivX. I noticed it had no sound, so I went into Media Player and it worked just fine.
So, just try Media Player…

Read full topic
